moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Stone-Cold Endurance!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Enduring effect to the user.

moves.name: Haze
moves.effect: Returns the target’s raised stats to normal.

syncMove.name: Lights, Camera, Ice Shard
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when none of the target’s stats are raised.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Healing Hail 1
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action during a hailstorm.
